title: Eden Hazard: I will be the first happy Chelsea player whenever this happens
text: Eden Hazard: I will be the first happy Chelsea player whenever this happens EDEN HAZARD insists his attitude is not selfish when it comes to the Chelsea scoresheet. By Jack Staplehurst PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 05:30, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 The winger failed to find the net against Swansea on Saturday but the Blues still prevailed 3-1 winners. The victory at Stamford Bridge extended Chelsea’s lead at the top of the table. Antonio Conte was able to rely on Cesc Fabregas, Pedro and Diego Costa as they added to their respective goal tallies. GETTY Eden Hazard is Chelsea's second top scorer this season behind Diego Costa If I play a good game and we win, I will be the first man happy Eden Hazard Eden Hazard chipped in by setting up Costa for Chelsea’s late clincher, but he insists not scoring is no bother to him as long as the Blues win and he performs well. “For me it is the same if I score, don’t score or assist,” Hazard told the club’s official website . “Even if I don’t make an assist or score goals – if I play a good game and we win, I will be the first man happy on the pitch.” GETTY Eden Hazard failed to score against Swansea but did provide an assist for Diego Costa Chelsea   Swansea Sat, February 25, 2017
